## External Audits and Management Advisory Services for the CSFA Program - ESDC

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3592842506-Doc4053033585
* **Amendment Number**: 10
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3592842506
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-13
* **Closing Date**: 2023-07-31T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

### Tender Status

The tender is now expired.

### Description

The Government of Canada is seeking to establish a contract for external audits and management advisory services for the CSFA (Canada Student Financial Assistance) Program, under the Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) department. The successful bidder will provide Information Technology Systems Audit, Forensic Audit, and External Audit Services, as defined in the Statement of Work, for a period of five (5) years, with the option to extend for up to four (4) additional one-year periods.

The work will be completed on an “as and when requested basis”, with the exception of Sections 6.1 to 6.4 of the Statement of Work. This tender is only open to suppliers who have been prequalified under the Professional Audit and Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement (E60ZQ-180001/XXX/ZQ).

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 142 Prom. du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 2K3, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Contact**: Martine Lamarche, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email**: martine.lamarche@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: None

### Terms and Conditions

By submitting a bid, suppliers acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation documents. Late bids will not be accepted, and all required supporting documentation must be submitted by the closing date
